sourcesContent:
import "./App.css";
import React, { useState } from "react";

import LineChart from "./LineChart";
import PieChart from "./PieChart";
import BarChart from "./BarChart";
import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';
import { Card,Container, Button,Row,Col } from "react-bootstrap";

function App() {
  return ( 
<Container className="mt-5" >
<Row>
        <Col><Card style={{ width: '100%' }}> 
     
     <Card.Body>
       <Card.Title>Annual Sales</Card.Title>
       <BarChart />
       <Card.Text className="mt-3">
         Some quick summary of annual sales for year 2022 - depart A and Department B
       </Card.Text>
       <Button variant="primary" size="sm">Detail</Button>
     </Card.Body>
   </Card></Col>
        
   <Col><Card style={{ width: '100%' }}> 
     
     <Card.Body>
       <Card.Title>Yearly Budget</Card.Title>
       <LineChart/>
       <Card.Text className="mt-3">
       Track expenses to manage your event budget online for free. 
       </Card.Text>
       <Button variant="primary" size="sm">Detail</Button>
     </Card.Body>
   </Card></Col>
   </Row>

   <Row>
        <Col><Card style={{ width: '100%' }}> 
     
     <Card.Body>
       <Card.Title>Global Market Share</Card.Title>
      <PieChart/>
       <Card.Text>
       A company's market share is its sales measured as a percentage of an industry's total revenues. 
       </Card.Text>
       <Button variant="primary">Detail</Button>
     </Card.Body>
   </Card></Col>
        
   <Col><Card style={{ width: '100%' }}> 
     
     <Card.Body>
       <Card.Title>Card Title</Card.Title>
       <BarChart />
       <Card.Text>
       Track expenses to manage your event budget online for free. 
       </Card.Text>
       <Button variant="primary">Detail</Button>
     </Card.Body>
   </Card></Col>
   </Row>
        </Container>


  ) ;
}

export default App;
